subject: Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador, the three-time Tour de France winner, may be clear to race in this summer’s Tour after the appeal regarding his doping case was postponed.
snippet: Alberto Contador, the three-time Tour de France winner, may be clear to race in this summer’s Tour after the appeal regarding his doping case was postponed.
